Population: Patients with altered sensation due to inferior alveolar nerve injury
Intervention: Low-level laser treatment (photon-plus GaA1As diode laser; Rønvig Dental, Denmark: 70 mW output, continuous wavelength of 820 nm)
Outcome: Sensation of the chin (spontaneous or evoked - anaesthesia/paraesthesia/dysaesthesia/hyperalgesia/allodynia)
Reasons for GRADE if not High: One, small trial assessed at high risk of bias. Imprecision of effect estimate and limited applicability as the trial included a small number of patients with only partial sensory loss.
